text: The Girl Spy Before Vicksburg is an American silent film produced by Kalem Company and directed by Sidney Olcott with Gene Gauntier, Robert Vignola and JP McGowan. ==Cast== * Gene Gauntier as Nan, the Girl Spy * Robert Vignola * JP McGowan * Jack J. Clark ==Production notes== The film was shot in Jacksonville, Florida. ==References== ==External links== * * The Girl Spy Before Vicksburg website dedicated to Sidney Olcott *Film at YouTube Category:1910 films Category:American films Category:American war drama films Category:American silent short films Category:Films set in Florida Category:Films shot in Jacksonville, Florida Category:Films directed by Sidney Olcott Category:1910 short films Category:1910s war drama films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1910 drama films
title: The Girl Spy Before Vicksburg
